001package reciprocal.geometry.rectangle;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.math.BigDecimal;
008import java.math.MathContext;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
010
011/**
012 * Immutable implementation of a rectangle which uses {@link Double} as type for
013 * its length and width
014 *
015 * @since 0.0.1
016 */
017public final class BigRectangle extends AbstractRectangle<BigDecimal, BigRectangle> {
018    @Serial
019    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
020
021    /**
022     * Constructor
023     *
024     * @param length length
025     * @param width width
026     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code length == null}
027     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code width == null}
028     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code length <= 0}
029     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code width <= 0}
030     * @since 0.0.1
031     */
032    public BigRectangle(final @NotNull BigDecimal length, final @NotNull BigDecimal width) {
033        super(length, width);
034        checkArgument(length.compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) > 0, "length > 0 expected but length = %s", length);
035        checkArgument(width.compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) > 0, "width > 0 expected but width = %s", width);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public boolean isSquare() {
040        return getLength().compareTo(getWidth()) == 0;
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public @NotNull BigDecimal getPerimeter() {
045        return BigDecimal.valueOf(2L).multiply(getLength().add(getWidth()));
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public @NotNull BigDecimal getDiagonal() {
050        return getLength().pow(2).add(getWidth().pow(2)).sqrt(MathContext.DECIMAL128);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Calculates diagonal
055     *
056     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
057     * @return diagonal
058     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
059     * @since 0.0.1
060     */
061    public @NotNull BigDecimal getDiagonal(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
062        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
063        return getLength().pow(2).add(getWidth().pow(2)).sqrt(mathContext);
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public @NotNull BigRectangle withLength(final @NotNull BigDecimal newLength) {
068        requireNonNull(newLength, "newLength");
069        checkArgument(newLength.compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) > 0, "newLength > 0 expected but newLength = %s", newLength);
070        return new BigRectangle(newLength, getWidth());
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public @NotNull BigRectangle withWidth(final @NotNull BigDecimal newWidth) {
075        requireNonNull(newWidth, "newWidth");
076        checkArgument(newWidth.compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) > 0, "newWidth > 0 expected but newWidth = %s", newWidth);
077        return new BigRectangle(getLength(), newWidth);
078    }
079}
